ingredients: +   1/2 cup milk,   +   1/4 cup canola oil, 1 large egg, 1   +   3/4 cups all-purpose flour,   +   1/2 cup white sugar, 2 teaspoons baking powder,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt, 1 cup chopped strawberries
